info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment:
Staying at the RF's apartment was really nice. The place was big, clean, and easy to get to Gulshan and other parts of Dhaka. It's right by Niketon gate #2 or near the Dhaka Swissotel, so it's easy to find when you're using your own car, Uber, or a taxi. The host was helpful and always answered my questions quickly. And if I needed anything, her husband was there to help too.
One thing to note is that Dhaka can be noisy, especially with traffic noise until midnight. But the room had a great balcony that caught a nice breeze, which I loved, especially in the summer. Overall, my experience at the RF's apartment was excellent.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2024,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: This place had great view form balcony and the room was every spacious . The cleaning support was excellent and the kitchen had all equipments. The security of the area and building was very good. The host was very responsive and helpful. The stay was just like home

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · December 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: I had an outstanding stay at this Airbnb apartment. It offered a serene and peaceful atmosphere, equipped with all the essentials for a comfortable experience. The owner's friendliness and helpfulness made my visit even more enjoyable. The surrounding area was exceptionally beautiful, complemented by a stunning view from the windows. I encountered no issues during my stay, and the facilities provided were top-notch. I highly recommend this place for a five-star experience.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Rikta Florence was an exceptional host. She was so friendly & responsive, always checking that we had everything we needed. She was really helpful in doing our laundry. The caretaker was great in helping with the bags & getting an Uber.
The place was a home from home, a normal home where you can have an authentic local stay. It was very clean, spacious & comfortable with full netting to prevent mosquitoes.
There is some traffic noise but this is Dhaka & it is a very busy noisy city. We didn’t find it disturbing.
Highly recommend staying here.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: She is a very kind and respectful person would love to stay here every time i come to Dhaka

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · July 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Rikta has a very strategic placement of her apartment as you can reach many places around without much time and hassle. The property is very strategic even only 350m from Aarong! View from the apartment is also lovely. Besides, daily necessities is handy when needed to be used and bought. Although plaster condition inside the listing can be a bit improved. Overall, it was a nice and lovely stay with housemaid helping you to get your room and usages cleaned if you don't mind climbing a bit stairs ✨

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: Rikta was very nice and really welcomed us. We loved being her guest. Definitely recommend.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: Fantastic host. Really friendly and flexible. Everything was super smooth.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Stayed over a week
rating_comment: In one word - excellent. I stayed in this listing for a month and it has a homely environment. The host is very helpful and accommodating. The room is large with all necessary furniture pieces and adequate seating arrangement. Natural light from two sides and adequate electric lights, including a bed side lamp. The veranda with a mini garden is superb. And the entire veranda is netted for protection against mosquitos. It is a luxury to sit there and enjoy the gentle breeze from the lake next door. Internet connectivity is stable and good. Everything the listing has on offer was useful to me - the work desk, overhead fan, more than enough universal wall sockets on all walls, nice and clean bathroom with hot water, room cleaning everyday, changing towel, bedsheet and pilow covers every week, electric tea maker in the room, filtered drinking water, a kitchenette for guest use that has a refrigerator, microwave oven, an induction cooker, rice cooker, utensils, and cutleries.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · January 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: + Very friendly hostess who answers round the clock and promptly to questions, the visa application was therefore much easier + Central location on the 3rd floor of a residential building in Niketan - There were several problems with the hot water supply, which Rikta could partially fix during my stay. Conclusion: Recommended

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · January 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment: I had the most peaceful and amazing stay in Dhaka at Rikta's flat. I have been travelling to Dhaka for a decade now and this was my first time staying in an Airbnb. Rikta is a wonderful host who is prompt in her responses and makes sure that her guests are comfortable. The location of the flat is great, just a stone's throw from the Hatirjheel lake with easy access to various modes of transport. The area is also easily navigable on foot. The room was spotlessly clean and matched the photographs and description exactly. It is a huge room which can sleep 2-3 people, so it was really convenient for me as a single woman travelling in Dhaka. The flat is extremely secure with a helpful caretaker who is readily available to assist you with your luggage. Whether you're travelling for work or for a holiday in Dhaka, this flat is well-equipped to suit both needs. I would strongly recommend this place to anyone visiting Dhaka and am looking forward to staying here again. Thank you so much, Rikta!
